Quick Start Klic Studio is a versatile audio and video localization and enhancement solution developed by Krillin AI. This minimalist yet powerful tool integrates video translation, dubbing, and voice cloning, supporting both landscape and portrait formats to ensure perfect presentation on all major platforms Bilibili, Xiaohongshu, Douyin, WeChat Video, Kuaishou, YouTube, TikTok, etc.. With an end-to-end workflow, you can transform raw materials into beautifully ready-to-use cross-platform content with just a few clicks.
